credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Rough Sketch of Coastal Scene with Cliffs
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
description: Quick sketch mapping out ocean and beach with cliffs on the right.  Sun shines through clouds onto cliffs.  Below left, separate sketch with what appears to be detail of cliffs.
name: Album page
